about_the_game:
Gain a strategic upper hand with the Tactical Tracker DLC Weapon Pack, featuring three great looking, hard-hitting weapons; the Marcus Tactical 8, FFF-45 ACP and ROCK AS100.

Featuring:

  • Marcus Tactical 8 - A powerful sniper rifle with improved stability, perfect for those explosive headshots
  • FFF-45 ACP - The only pistol to use special luring ammo, for those looking to outwit the competition
  • ROCK AS100 - A magazine-fed shotgun with the option to fire either buckshot or slugs - you’ll be spoilt for choice

*Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
